title: AI/ML Roadmap
subtitle: From Absolute Beginner to Advanced Expert

phases.title: Prerequisites & Foundations
phases.description: Build the essential programming and tooling skills needed before diving into AI/ML. Master Python, Git, and development environments.

phases.title: Mathematics for AI/ML
phases.description: Master the mathematical foundations that power every ML algorithm — linear algebra, calculus, probability, statistics, and optimization.

phases.title: Data Handling & Preprocessing
phases.description: Learn to collect, clean, transform, visualize, and prepare data for machine learning models using industry-standard tools.

phases.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
phases.description: Understand what machine learning is and master the core algorithms for supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and model evaluation.

phases.title: Deep Learning
phases.description: Dive deep into neural networks — from perceptrons to transformers. Master TensorFlow, PyTorch, and modern architectures.

phases.title: Natural Language Processing
phases.description: Master NLP from text preprocessing to transformer-based LLMs. Build chatbots, sentiment analyzers, and work with Hugging Face.

phases.title: Computer Vision
phases.description: Learn to build systems that understand images and video — from basic image processing to object detection and image generation.

phases.title: Reinforcement Learning
phases.description: Train agents to make decisions by interacting with environments. From Q-learning to PPO and real-world applications.

phases.title: MLOps & Deployment
phases.description: Learn to deploy, monitor, and maintain ML models in production. Master Docker, APIs, cloud platforms, and CI/CD for ML.

phases.title: Specializations & Emerging Topics
phases.description: Explore cutting-edge AI specializations — time series, recommender systems, graph neural networks, explainable AI, and more.

phases.title: Projects & Portfolio
phases.description: Apply everything you've learned by building real-world projects, competing on Kaggle, and building a professional AI/ML portfolio.
